<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Angel of Death](/Feats.aspx?ID=1893) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 158 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Assassin](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=48)

**Prerequisites**
[Assassin Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1890)

</column>

---

All your Strikes against a creature you have Marked for Death have the [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) trait, causing the mark to be instantly killed when reduced to 0 Hit Points. When killed in this way, attempts to communicate with it, return it to life, turn it into an undead, or otherwise disturb its afterlife fail unless the effect's [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) level is higher than half your level when you killed the creature (rounded up), or originates from an [artifact](/equipment/artifacts) or a deity.
name: Angel of Death
